message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I take a bit more considering the inflation rate affects me less.
Your turn Alice. Let's be fair to each other - the inflation is no joke for either of us!
I understand the inflation is hitting you hard, but I need a bit more to be comfortable with this deal. This is my final offer.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. My last offer was very fair. This inflation is killing us both - take this deal so we can both get something!
